title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Candelabrum and a Ceiling", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush with watercolor washes over traces of graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Four studies of friezes and grotesque candelabrum; study of ceiling; papal coat of arms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Candelabrum and a Ceiling", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink, brush with watercolor washes over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2304.
